message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. $9,000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $10,500?  That's a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
I'm getting closer, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offers.
